messages.content:
The user asked you to create the source code with the following specification:
```
<GOAL>count of values</GOAL>
<PLAN>1. Extract the "values" array from the simpleValue2 object
2. Count occurrences of each unique string value using a frequency counter approach
3. Generate a result object with the counts while preserving the original data</PLAN>
<SPEC>The Value Counter will analyze the "values" array within the simpleValue2 object and count the occurrences of each unique string. It will generate a report showing each unique value and its count. The counter will handle empty arrays and maintain the original data structure while adding the count results.</SPEC>
```
